app_name: Groups Control Groups Voice Recording and Karaoke Apps Voice Dictation
app_description: With Voice Dictation you can dictate any text and send it via Email SMS WhatsApp Tweeter Facebook or you can copy it and use it in any application you want. You will be surprised at how accurate and fast it is. You ll begin using it every day for both fun and work. Voice Dictation uses the most advanced and up to date speech recognition technology.
